title: Project-Based Mathematics Skills Integration Education for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and general digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: An educational program focusing on math lesson design integrated with field practice and digital technology

learning_goals: Develop two or more digital resources for math lessons by applying the TPACK (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge) framework.
Design and implement technology-integrated lessons for enhancing math concept learning using PBL approaches.
Submit an analysis report on the effectiveness of technology-integrated lessons through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
